name: Lights OFF (itch) (Majin)
description:
CONTROLS
   
A - LEFT
D - RIGHT
SPACE - JUMP
E - INTERECTION
  
Game made for Brackeys Gamejam.
Done in 3 days by a team of beginners so everything that was done.
was learned and executed in the moment.
  
LIGHTS OFF is about fear, nightmares and fun! <font></font>
You'll need to guide little Bonnie across her bedroom, trying to escape from evil plushies.
The only way to overcome this girl's fear is turning the lights on, so be careful through this journey.
Jump, run and have fun while going deep inside her (creepy?) imagination.
Always remember: Bonnie may be afraid of the dark, but they are horrified by light!
  
The objective of the game is to reach the end and turn on the light.
For this, it is necessary to click on "E" on the switch.
